duties_responsibilities.duty: Create and improve workflows for Unreal Editor for Fortnite, Fortnite, and other games.
Create and improve UI/UX for tools made by Epic. Add new features.
Write unit and functional automated tests for tools made by Epic.
Instrument telemetry and visualize/report tools usage with data transformation.
Work closely with QA and other developers to streamline/optimize human interactions and problem-solving.
Collaborate with a wide variety of Fortnite engineering and content creation teams to solve complex technical challenges in ways that move the stability and quality of Fortnite forward.
